properties.entry: SELECT COUPON_NO, /* 쿠폰번호 */ COUPON_CONTENT, /* 쿠폰내용 */ TO_CHAR(COUPON_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COUPON_DATE, /* 쿠폰등록일 */ COUPON_CODE, /* 쿠폰코드 */ COUPON_CATE_CD, /* 쿠폰카테고리 코드*/ COUPON_CATE_NM, /* 쿠폰카테고리명 */ COUPON_PERCENT, /* 쿠폰할인율 */ (SELECT NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND MEM_NO = 1) AS WRITER /* 작성자 */ FROM TB_COUPON
